name: NinjaHagakure
description:
[this game is a 5 minute demo version]

Hello!!

Finally, "Ninja Hagakure" is released on Steam

There are so many survival games these days, but it's not the same It's not just manipulation.

Use 40 ninja skills to beat various enemies

The Asset of my game was very helpful here.

I wouldn't have made the game without them.

I heartily thank you.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2124640/Ninja_Hagakure/
